location_machine_xrefs.condition: They serviced it 7/02; working the best I've seen it here. 'Release Bracelet' skill shot perfect again, ball no longer slow, and light for Car Crunch functioning (was out since at least Feb). Still a few oddities: uneven playfield in spots, and the 2 times I made the Chun-Li shot, the ball exited the left ramp so quickly it bounced off the glass and onto the right flipper.

machine_conditions.comment: They serviced it 7/02; working the best I've seen it here. 'Release Bracelet' skill shot perfect again, ball no longer slow, and light for Car Crunch functioning (was out since at least Feb). Still a few oddities: uneven playfield in spots, and the 2 times I made the Chun-Li shot, the ball exited the left ramp so quickly it bounced off the glass and onto the right flipper.
"Bracelet target" sensor malfunctioning; full points for skill shot currently impossible

name: SilverCity Metropolis Cinemas
description:
Arcade after ticket taker; must pay for film to play. Everything uses tokens. The single pinball & most of the arcade games are 3 tokens per credit, some are more, one/two are 2 tokens.

If you drop $20 at once on tokens, 1 pinball credit = 75c! "Buy in
